# init(string:)

**Initializer**

Creates an attributed string with the specified text and no attribute information.

## Declaration

```swift
init(string str: String)
```

## Parameters

- **str**: The text for the new attributed string.

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString] object initialized with the characters of `str` and no attribute information.

## Related Documentation

- **init(RTF:documentAttributes:)**: Creates an attributed string by decoding the stream of RTF commands and data in the specified data object.
- **Attributed String Programming Guide**

## Creating from another string

- **init(string:attributes:)**: Creates an attributed string with the specified text and attributes.
- **init(attributedString:)**: Creates a new attributed string from the contents of another attributed string.
